name: Sulfuric Acid Vial
description:
An odorless syrupy liquid which is highly corrosive.

Intoxication inflicts Mangled.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Flask of Bleach
description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burn and lungs damage.

Increases the Hindered penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4%.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

name: Bottle of Chloroform
description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anesthetic capabilities.

Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic gas clouds by 20%.

name: Garish Makeup Kit
description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote. The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effects.

Increases the duration of Invigoration by 2 seconds.

name: Cheap Gin Bottle
description:
Along with a hell of a headache, the only remnant of a good time, done cheap.

Start with 2 extra bottles. Increases maximum carried bottles amount by 2.

name: Ether 15 vol%
description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.

Increases the duration of Intoxication by 1 second.

name: Cigar Box
description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers. Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.

While The Clown or a Survivor is Invigorated, they see all other Survivor and Killer auras within 16 meters.

name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man. Has a faint taste of machinery oil.

Auras of Intoxicated or Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

name: Redhead's Pinky Finger
description:
The prized pinky of a redhead. Faintly fragrant. Tastes of potpourri and varnish.

Direct hits by a bottle of Afterpiece Tonic inflict Exposed until Intoxication ends.Start with 2 fewer bottles. Decreases maximum carried bottles amount by 2.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

name: Cheap Cologne
description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.

Increases Marked duration by 10 seconds.

name: Chewed Pen
description:
Blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny’s DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.

Survivors that are in the dying state take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face.

name: Driver's License
description:
A driver’s license revealing Olsen’s true identity: Danny Johnson.

When Marking a Survivor repairing a generator, the generator explodes and loses 20% progress.The affected generator becomes blocked for 15 seconds.When Marking multiple Survivors at the same time, the loss of progress only applies once.

name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
description:
Sheath allowing a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely. Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.

The Ghost Face gains 10% movement speed for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.

name: Headline Cutouts
description:
Cutouts of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face only authored some of the headlines, he committed all the murders.

Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 40%.

name: Knife Belt Clip
description:
Perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you’re planning to do tonight.

Reduces the Terror Radius by 8 meters while crouching.

name: Lasting Perfume
description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for victims he planned to write about.

Survivors that are on a hook take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face.

name: Leather Knife Sheath
description:
Quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.

Increases crouched movement speed by 10%.

name: Marked Map
description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each X represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.

Increases duration of Killer Instinct after being revealed by 2 seconds.

name: Night Vision Monocular
description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.

A Survivor that reveals The Ghost Face is inflicted with Exhausted for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

name: Olsen's Address Book
description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.

Survivors that are Marked reveal their auras for 5 seconds when performing rushed actions.

name: Olsen’s Journal
description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.

A Survivor that is Marked is inflicted with Oblivious until the Mark expires.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: Olsen’s Wallet
description:
Olsen’s wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen’s first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.

Breaking a pallet or wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

name: Outdoor Security Camera
description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville. The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of Ghost Face without providing any real clues to the police.

The auras of all Survivors are revealed for 7 seconds when a Marked Survivor is put into the dying state.

name: “Philly”
description:
Stolen camera from a victim of Olsen’s in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.

Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor by 20%.

name: Cinch Straps
description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.

Night Shroud remains active after a failed basic attack.

name: Telephoto Lens
description:
A manual focus lens to take pictures from afar without being noticed.

A Survivor that reveals The Ghost Face is inflicted with Oblivious for 60 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: “Ghost Face Caught on Tape”
description:
Tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorized Roseville.

Instantly recharges Night Shroud after a successful basic attack that puts a Survivor into the dying state.

name: Victim’s Detailed Routine
description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville. Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate and counter their next move.

After being Marked, Survivors are inflicted with Exhausted for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

name: Walleye's Matchbook
description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim’s phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.

Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 6 seconds.

name: Barbed Wire
description:
Pliable American made steel lined with sharp barbs. Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.

Increases Survivor mend time by 3.5 seconds.

name: Bayshore’s Cigar
description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb’s boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.

Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 1 second.

name: Bayshore’s Gold Tooth
description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.

Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 9%.

name: Chewing Tobacco
description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale. Stimulates the nervous system.

Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 0.5 seconds.

name: Gold Creek Whiskey
description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb’s anger and slowed his step.

Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

name: Hellshire Iron
description:
The Hellshire Gang’s branding iron. Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.

When a Survivor is speared, gain Undetectable. The effect persists for 10 seconds after the Survivor is no longer speared.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

name: Honey Locust Thorns
description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.

Breaking free from the spear inflicts Mangled.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Iridescent Coin
description:
A glass-like coin molded from The Fog itself. Payment to the bounty hunter for services rendered.

Survivors speared from at least 12 meters away are inflicted with Exposed for as long as they remain speared.

Exposed survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

name: Jaw Smasher
description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb’s jaw during a frenzied shootout. It brings back a burning desire for revenge.

Increases movement speed by 1% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

name: Marshal's Badge
description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang’s bounties.

Decreases Terror Radius by 4 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

name: Modified Ammo Belt
description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialized weaponry. Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.

Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.25 seconds.

name: Poison Oak Leaves
description:
An ordinary looking plant, Caleb found that spears coated in its oil caused unbearable blistering around wounds.

Increases Survivor mend time by 1.5 seconds.

name: Prison Chain
description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb’s ankle. It’s been repurposed to hook onto a spear.

Increases time required for a Survivor to break free from a spear by 10%.

name: Rickety Chain
description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun. Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints for Speared score events.Survivors break free 33% faster.

name: Rusted Spike
description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity. The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.

The Redeemer's shots inflict Mangled.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Snake Oil
description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman. Purported to cure all that ails you.

Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 5%.

name: Spit Polish Rag
description:
A grimy piece of burlap. Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the speargun in the heat of a shootout.

Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

name: Tin Oil Can
description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery. Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.

Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

name: Wanted Poster
description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly. Kept Caleb focused on the hunt.

Increases movement speed by 2.5% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

name: Warden’s Keys
description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.

Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.5 seconds.

name: Amanita Toxin
description:
A toxin applied to the Hatchets' blade. The Amanita mushrooms' toxin numbs the mind.

Hatchets inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

name: Bandaged Haft
description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchets' haft.

Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 10%.

name: Begrimed Head
description:
These Hatchets' heads are stained with a foul substance that afflict anyone it touches with debilities.

Hit target suffers from the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects until fully healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Yellowed Cloth
description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.

Increases thrown hatchet speed by 10%.

name: Coarse Stone
description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good. A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.

Hitting a target increases the volume of their grunts of pain by 50% until healed.

name: Deerskin Gloves
description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.

Decreases time required to reload Hatchets at a locker by 20%.

name: Weighted Head
description:
An oddly weighted hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target. It requires a wielder with a strong arm.

Hatchets inflict Incapacitated for 10 seconds.

Incapacitated prevents Survivors from healing, repairing, sabotaging, cleansing, blessing, mending, or using items.

name: Flower Babushka
description:
A clean and colorful kerchief adorned with a flower pattern. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.

Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 12%.

name: Glowing Concoction
description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.

Reveals the auras of Survivors hit by Hatchets for 5 seconds.

name: Infantry Belt
description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier. Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.

Start with 2 extra Hatchets.Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 2.

name: Iridescent Head
description:
A glass-like Hatchet head molded from The Fog Itself. The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

Successful Hatchet hits immediately put healthy Survivors into the dying state.Sets maximum number of carried Hatchets to 1.

name: Leather Loop
description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.

Start with 1 extra Hatchet.Increases maximum carried Hatchet amount by 1.

name: Manna Grass Braid
description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.

Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 8%.

name: Oak Haft
description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.

Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 20%.

name: Soldier's Puttee
description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier, it provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.

The Huntress moves 4.6 m/s when she has no Hatchets.

name: Rusty Head
description:
These Hatchets' heads are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Hatchets inflict Mangled.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Shiny Pin
description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen. Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.

Increases The Huntress' movement speed by 5% while aiming or throwing a Hatchet.

name: Venomous Concoction
description:
A toxic concoction applied to the Hatchets' blade. The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus snake venom which gives it fatiguing capabilities.

Hatchets inflict Exhausted for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

name: Wooden Fox
description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches. A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.

Grants Undetectable for 30 seconds after reloading.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

name: Rose Root
description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.

Increases thrown Hatchet speed by 20%.

name: Iridescent Brick
description:
Once representative of Max Jr’s confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room’s barricade came crashing down.

After maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds, grants Undetectable until the Chainsaw Sprint ends.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

name: Cat Figurine
description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye. He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.

Displays the target location of a Pounce.

name: Rusted Needle
description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children’s tattered clothes.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Hemorrhage until healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors.

name: Sewer Sludge
description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.

Increases time to crush Victor when attached by 2 seconds.

name: Madeleine’s Scarf
description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death. The Twins kept it as a memento.

Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.3 m/s.

name: Stale Biscuit
description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town’s market. It wasn’t much, but it was better than most meals.

Decreases Pounce cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

name: Weighty Rattle
description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him. It’s entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Broken for 20 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

name: Forest Stew
description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.

Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.6 m/s.

name: Spinning Top
description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own. He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.

Victor's Pounce causes Survivors to drop their carried items.

name: Drop of Perfume
description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with. It has a pleasant, disarming scent.

Survivors in Victor's alert range while he is dormant are inflicted with Oblivious.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: Victor’s Soldier
description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared. Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.

Crushing Victor while he is dormant reveals the Survivor's aura for 6 seconds.

name: Silencing Cloth
description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth. Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.

Charlotte gains Undetectable for 20 seconds after waking from her dormant state.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

name: Tiny Fingernail
description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor’s death. As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.

Decreases Victor's Unbind time by 0.5 seconds.

name: Iridescent Pendant
description:
A glass-like pendant molded from The Fog itself. There’s a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.

Crushing Victor while he is dormant inflicts Exposed for 45 seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

name: Soured Milk
description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured. Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.

Increases Victor's alert range by 2 meters.

name: Toy Sword
description:
A miniscule toy sword, only a few inches long. Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.

Decreases Pounce charge time by 0.2 seconds.

name: Cat’s Eye
description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes’ family. Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.

Victor becomes silent while Pounce is fully charged.

name: Madeleine’s Glove
description:
A glove once owned by The Twins’ mother. During desperate times, it was held over Victor’s mouth to keep him from making a peep.

Increases Victor's alert range by 4 meters.

name: Bloody Black Hood
description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte. Soon, he became the prey.

Decreases Charlotte's waking time by 0.5 seconds.

name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn. A symbol of his tenacity.

Increases time to crush Victor when he is dormant by 0.2 seconds.

name: Baby Teeth
description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago. They’re unusually sharp.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

name: Damaged Syringe
description: Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.Increases time it takes Survivors to use a Vaccine by 2 seconds.Increases length of Killer Instinct when Survivors use a Vaccine by 1.5 seconds.

name: Tyrant Gore
description: A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat. There are signs of severe burns.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 50%.Decreases zombie respawn time by 5 seconds.

name: Serotonin Injector
description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.Grants Undetectable for 15 seconds when a zombie is destroyed.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

name: T-Virus Sample
description: A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 100%.

name: Plant 43 Vines
description: The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.Increases time required for Survivors to open Supply Cases by 4 seconds.

name: Licker Tongue
description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.Survivors are Hindered for an extra 0.2 seconds after being Contaminated.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

name: NE-α Parasite
description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it’s capable of hijacking its host’s brain.Becoming Contaminated inflicts Oblivious for 60 seconds, or until the Survivor receives a Vaccine.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: Jill’s Sandwich
description: It’s tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle. Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that can’t be missed.Reveals a Survivor's aura for 12 seconds after they unlock a Supply Case.

name: Broken Recovery Coin
description: A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath. It’s broken in half.Removes 1 Supply Case from the trial.

name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
description: Who will save them now? There’s something about this ink ribbon being dry that energizes zombies.Decreases zombie respawn time by 5 seconds.Increases zombie movement speed by 50%.Any zombies destroyed after all generators are repaired will respawn in an exit area.

name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
description: A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.Increases Zombie movement speed by 150% for 60 seconds after a generator is repaired.

name: Brian’s Intestine
description: The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD. It's an appetizing sight for zombies.Increases zombie movement speed by 25%.

name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
description:
A glass-like badge molded from The Fog itself. It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.Survivors are inflicted with Exposed for 60 seconds when using a Vaccine.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

name: Visitor Wristband
description: An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility. It also doubles as a tracking device.Increases zombie detection range by 2 meters and field of view by 10 degrees.

name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
description: A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge. Edited by Chris Redfield.Zombies’ auras turn yellow for 6 seconds after hitting a Survivor.

name: Marvin’s Blood
description: The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City police officer.Increases mutation rate when hitting Survivors with Tentacle Strike by 25%.

name: Adrenaline Injector
description: A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.Increases length of Killer Instinct when Survivors use a Vaccine by 3 seconds.

name: Mikhail’s Eye
description: While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him. It remains a tasty treat for zombies.Increases zombie movement speed by 35%.

name: Zombie Heart
description: The heart of an eviscerated zombie. It’s considered hazardous waste as it’s certainly teeming with viruses.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 50%.

name: Admin Wristband
description: An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility. While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.Increases zombie detection range by 4 meters and field of view by 18 degrees.

name: Larry’s Blood
description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.

Increases the possessed chain's maximum travel distance by 4 meters.

name: Bent Nail
description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton’s hand. Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.

Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints when binding a Survivor with a possessed chain.When hitting a Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

name: Lively Crickets
description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.

Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 10%.

name: Burning Candle
description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.

Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 3 seconds.

name: Leather Strip
description:
Leather strips torn from a cenobite’s uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.

Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 3%.

name: Wriggling Maggots
description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.

Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 15%.

name: Spoiled Meal
description:
A pile of mold, feasted on by a cockroach. Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton’s mysterious disappearance...

Increases the possessed chain’s maximum travel distance by 2 meters.

name: Skewered Rat
description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home’s rat problem.

Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 9%.

name: Flickering Television
description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the cenobites.

Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 4 meters.

name: Liquified Gore
description:
The result of summoning the cenobites. There’s no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.

Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 1 second.

name: Torture Pillar
description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.

Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 6 seconds.

name: Frank’s Heart
description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother’s blood.

Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 8 meters.

name: Larry’s Remains
description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.

Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 2 seconds.

name: Slice of Frank
description:
A slab of Frank’s face after his torture at the hand of the cenobites.

Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration are inflicted with Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

name: Greasy Black Lens
description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.

Survivors hit by a possessed chain are revealed for 6 seconds.

name: Impaling Wire
description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.

When a Survivor uses the environment to break a chain, an additional chain will target them.

name: Chatterer’s Tooth
description:
A fragment from a cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly. This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.

Reveal the Lament Configuration.Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates Chain Hunts.Gain the Undetectable status effect for 25 seconds after picking up the Lament Configuration.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

name: Engineer’s Fang
description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany cenobites on their grim undertakings.

Possessed chains injure healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional chains.Increases the time to close the gateway after hitting a healthy Survivor with a possessed chain by 50%.When hitting an injured Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
description:
A glass-like puzzle box molded from The Fog itself. This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.

When a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 meters of the Lament Configuration cannot see its aura.

name: Charcoal Stick
description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.

The Dire Crow's aura is no longer visible when in flight.The Dire Crow's aura is visible for 0.5 seconds when summoned.

name: Oil Paints
description:
There's little left but a few globs of black and gray, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.

Increases the Dire Crow's Killer Instinct detection range by 1.5 meters.

Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

name: Vibrant Obituary
description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint. It seems tragedy is a daily thing.

Increases the length of time a Dire Crow's Killer Instinct reveals Survivors by 1.5 seconds.

Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

name: Thick Tar
description:

Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

name: Polished Electrode
description:
A like-new electrode, standard equipment to conduct electroconvulsive treatments.

Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 3 meters.

name: "Restraint" - Class II
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 1 second when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

name: "Restraint" - Class III
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 2 seconds when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated. Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 3 seconds when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

name: Interview Tape
description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an un-edited interview of a victim. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.

Shock Therapy special ability changes from a cone to a beam with a 24 meter range and a 2 meter width.

name: Blond Hair
description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 10 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

name: Boyfriend's Memo
description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.

Increases the range of The Shape's lunge attack while in Evil Within I by 50%.

name: Dead Rabbit
description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.

Decreases Terror Radius in Evil Within II by 25%.Increases Terror Radius in Evil Within III by 25%.

name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.

Unlimited duration of Evil Within III.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.

name: Glass Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I reveals that Survivor's aura for 3 seconds.

name: Hair Bow
description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 30 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

name: Hair Brush
description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 20 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

name: Jewelry
description:
A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favorites.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 20%.

name: Jewelry Box
description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 30%.

name: J.Myers Memorial
description:
A glossy page ripped from the '65 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.

Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 25%.

name: Judith's Journal
description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.

You become obsessed with one Survivor.Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking your Obsession by 40%.

name: Judith's Tombstone
description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.

Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.Decreases movement speed by 9% while Evil Within III is active.

name: Lock of Hair
description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 40 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 100%.

name: Memorial Flower
description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.

Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 11%.

name: Mirror Shard
description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 5 seconds.

name: Reflective Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 2 seconds.

name: Scratched Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.

Evil Within I reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 32 meter range.Evil Within cannot progress past TIER I.For each Hit score event, score 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 200% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

name: Tacky Earrings
description:
A very cheap piece of jewelry made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 10%.

name: Tombstone Piece
description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.

Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 150%.

name: Vanity Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.

Evil Within II reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 16 meter range.Evil Within cannot progress past TIER II.For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 150% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

name: Rickety Pinwheel
description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima. It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.

While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Oblivious status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: Videotape Copy
description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako. It dampens the desire for vengeance.

Projection does not inflict Condemned to nearby Survivors.Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear score events.

name: Old Newspaper
description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.

Increases the Manifestation invisibility duration by 33%.

name: Cabin Sign
description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape. Carries the memory of those first curses.

Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by 12 seconds.

name: Mother's Mirror
description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house. A reminder of what Sadako has lost.

Increases the Manifestation intermittent visibility duration by 2 seconds.

name: Reiko's Watch
description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi. A distracting and constant reminder of one’s impending doom.

Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by 50%.

name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape. Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.

While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Blindness status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

name: Clump of Hair
description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.

Decreases the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by 6 meters.

name: Well Stone
description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.

Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after being turned off by a Survivor by 6 seconds.

name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather. A reminder that death comes to us all.

Decreases the time it takes for Survivors to gain Condemned by 12% when holding a tape.

name: Black Strap
description: A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The color makes it difficult to see the blood soaked into it.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 0.5 meters.

name: Burning Man Painting
description: A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1.5 meters.

name: Cinderella Music Box
description: A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella. Found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 15 seconds.

name: Copper Ring
description: Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It’s engraved with a picture of a spider.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

name: Crimson Ceremony Book
description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.Rites of Judgment trails inflict Hemorrhage until Torment ends.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors.

name: Dead Butterfly
description: A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It’s frail and nearly falls apart when touched.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

name: Forgotten Videotape
description: A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 3 seconds.

name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
description: A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it. The Entity’s influence seems to have altered it.When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the auras of all Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

name: Lead Ring
description: Found in a refrigerator. It’s engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 10 seconds.

name: Leopard-Print Fabric
description: A shred of pink, leopard print fabric. It’s difficult to tell what it was used for.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 0.5 seconds.

name: Lost Memories Book
description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.Rites of Judgment trails inflict Oblivious for 15 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

name: Mannequin Foot
description: The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 20 seconds.

name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgment
description: A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

name: Obsidian Goblet
description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.Grants Undetectable while standing on a Rites of Judgment trail.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

name: Rust-colored Egg
description:
An old-looking egg, colored reddish orange. About the size of a quail’s egg.Rites of Judgment trails inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

name: Scarlet Egg
description: A fresh egg, strikingly red in color. About the size of a quail’s egg.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 1.5 seconds.

name: Spearhead
description: The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It’s flaked with blood from its last victim.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1.5 seconds.

name: Tablet of the Oppressor
description: A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
description: A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 4 seconds.

name: Wax Doll
description: A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgment.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1 meter.

name: Bloody Coil
description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the traps' springs more dangerous.

When a Bear Trap is disarmed by a healthy Survivor, the bloody coils exact their price and that Survivor becomes injured.

name: Iridescent Stone
description:
Traps sharpened with this sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.

Every 30 seconds, one closed Bear Trap chosen at random becomes set.

name: Oily Coil
description:
An oiled spring that marks the hands of those who meddle with a Bear Trap.

When resetting a Bear Trap, reveal the aura of the most recent Survivor to disarm it for 5 seconds.

name: Rusted Jaws
description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Bear Traps inflict Mangled on trapped survivors.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

name: Tension Spring
description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.

A Bear Trap resets 2 seconds after a Survivor escapes from it.

name: Coffee Grounds
description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.

Gain a 5% Haste status effect for 5 seconds after setting a Bear Trap.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

name: Bloody Boa
description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim’s slashed neck. A number of pockets are concealed within it.

Increases the maximum carried Blades by 8.Start the Trial with 8 additional Blades.

name: Memento Blades
description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse. Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.

Increases number of Blade hits required for maximum Laceration by 1.Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper score events.

name: Trick Pouch
description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets. Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.

Increases maximum carried Blades by 4.Start the Trial with 4 additional Blades.

name: Killing Part Chords
description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for. Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.

Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 1%.

name: Inferno Wires
description:
Burnt wires from the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members. Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.

Increases duration of Main Event by 25%.

name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster. Sore as his wrist was after hundreds of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.

Decreases the number of Blades required to reach maximum throw rate by 1.

name: On Target Single
description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame. Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.

Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 2 seconds.

name: Lucky Blade
description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned. Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.

Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.2 seconds for each Blade hit while it is active.

name: Caged Heart Shoes
description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart. Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.

Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 2.5%.

name: Tequila Moonrock
description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar. Became a favorite of Ji-Woon's.

Increases duration of Main Event by 50%.

name: Fizz-Spin Soda
description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN. High sugar and caffeine content.

Decreases the number of Blades required to reach maximum throw rate by 2.

name: Waiting for You Watch
description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I’ll Be Waiting for You. It’s a stage prop that doesn’t work and never will.

Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.3 seconds for each Blade hit while it is active.

name: Ripper Brace
description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper. Though unintentional, the design stabilizes the wrist better than many medical braces.

Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 3 seconds.

name: Melodious Murder
description:
An audio file of victims’ crisp, clear shrieks. Ji-Woon incorporated the sounds into one of his more popular tracks.

Increases Blade reload speed at lockers by 25%.

name: Diamond Cufflinks
description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon. Rubbing off the blood, there’s so much to be seen in the glitter.

Reveals Survivor auras for 6 seconds when their Laceration reaches one Blade hit from maximum.

name: Edge of Revival Album
description:
The Trickster’s debut album. The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.

Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50% Laceration to nearby Survivors.

name: Trick Blades
description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination. A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the tricks he performed.

Blades ricochet off the environment twice.Ricochet hits grant bonus Bloodpoints.

name: Cut Thru U Single
description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks. Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.

Blades pierce through Survivors.Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50% Laceration.

name: Death Throes Compilation
description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record. Terrifying and emotionally raw.

When Main Event ends, The Trickster's Blades are replenished.

name: Iridescent Photocard
description:
A glass-like photo molded from The Fog itself. Ji-Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.

When a Survivor’s Laceration Meter is two or less Blade hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with Exposed.

Exposed survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

name: Original Pain
description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead’s skull. Such pleasure and pain.

Injured Survivors who break free from a possessed chain suffer from Deep Wound.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

name: Ring Drawing
description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi. Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.

Condemned Survivors spread Condemned to other Survivors who complete a healing action on them.

name: Distorted Photo
description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of them distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.

Survivors that witness Manifestation from within 16 meters scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds.

name: Telephone
description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call. They are frozen in fear as they realize they have seven days to live.

Manifestation afflicts Survivors within 7 meters with the Hindered status effect for 3 seconds.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

name: Tape Editing Deck
description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyze and copy the tape. Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.

Each Survivor starts the trial with a Tape in their possession, and their target TV is the furthest from their location.

name: Remote Control
description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin. It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.

After using Projection, reveal the auras of Survivors carrying a Tape within 16 meters of any TV for 7 seconds.

name: Iridescent Videotape
description:
The original tape containing Sadako’s curse.

Hitting a Survivor within 8 seconds after Manifesting turns on the last 4 TVs turned off by Projection.
